metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0838 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Buffer overflow in the C implementation of the apply_delta function in_pack.c in Dulwich before 0.9.9 allows remote attackers to executearbitrary code via a crafted pack file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0838` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

pypy-dulwich - 0.10.1-1
python-dulwich - 0.10.1-1
python3-dulwich - 0.10.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dulwich package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.10.1-1').
